content: get this pattern free for 1 month with code cc2019 please check out the #crochetcancerchallenge this beanie was designed as part of the #crochetcancerchallenge of 2019 we decided to represent colon cancer as this is something that affects one of our designers sara and her father the design is unisex adding a faux fur pom pom really completes the look worked from the bottom up you will construct the ribbing first then work on the body and close it up at the top want to help us by testing our patterns join our fb group sunflower cottage crochet community check out our website for more free patterns and great tutorials all about crochet www sunflowercottagecrochet com
